children.subject: Just a note, you can submit the application without all letters in. https://grad.berkeley.edu/admissions/apply/admissions-faq/#letters-of-recommendation I had a similar issue where a recommender couldn't submit until the evening but I was able to turn my application in before his submit and everything was received just fine!
I see, I didn’t know that. I’m hoping my application can still be considered though since I based the timing off of the deadline listed on the website & portal
Yeah understandable. I was under the same impression as you (didn't know I could submit without the letter) until I checked the FAQ. I hope it works out for you

Also just wondering, did anyone else face the same issue? I’m guessing most people finished submitting earlier so this probably doesn’t apply to them. But I had to wait until my final recommender submitted their letter yesterday, and I was driving home, so I wasn’t available to hit submit until later that evening.

I was watching the timer on the application portal frequently to make sure, so I really thought there was still time left before the deadline. Hopefully there’s something that can be done :(
Thanks! I did email Michael on Friday already, but I’m guessing he might not be checking his email over spring break
Not sure if you figured this out, but definitely email Michael Sun about this if you haven't already: msun86@eecs.berkeley.edu

history.content:
I'm an undergraduate EECS major at Berkeley currently applying to the 5th Year M.S. program. The website said that the deadline was at 8:59pm Pacific Standard Time (which would be 9:59pm Pacific Daylight Time), which is 5 minutes from now. The application portal also currently says that there are 5 minutes left to submit the application. 

However, when I try to submit my payment, it says that the deadline has passed already. I've had this problem since around 15 minutes ago. I've already filled in all the information and just need to make a payment to submit my application. Is there any way someone can help me with this? Thank you so much!

(Also, whenever I upload a file to the portal, it says the upload date is 3/20 instead of 3/19 — not sure if this is because the time on the portal is incorrect for some reason)
history.subject: (URGENT) Issue with EECS 5th Year M.S. Application
